source_item.name: Greater Rune of the Void Ritual

effects.display_string:
Set: Your abilities have a chance to start a Winning Streak! increasing the damage of Rampage by 2%, stacking up to 10 times.
Rampage has a 15% chance to end your Winning Streak!

Set: When you gain a stack of Winning Streak! you have an even chance to either cause your next Bloodthirst to deal 15% increased damage and have 25% increased chance to critically strike or cause your next Raging Blow to deal 15% increased damage and generate 2 additional Rage.

sockets.display_string: +181 Primary Stat and +0.15% Critical Effect per unique Algari gem color

spells.description: Equip: Embrace the darkness. Double the effects of your other Nerubian embellished item, positive and negative.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Gauntlets of Death's Guardian

name: Cyrce's Circlet
description: Sea dogs and tale spinners tell stories of a mythical siren that could lure even the stubbornest sailors to a watery grave.

name: Suspicious Energy Drink

spells.description: Equip: When you use harmful spells or abilities, there is a chance you also take a sip of the energy drink, increasing your Mastery by 5,111 for 10 sec. Gain an additional 750 Mastery if you are below 35% health.

description: A death-defying concoction made with Mama's secret recipe to numb your sense of self-preservation.

spells.description: Use: Deal yourself in, granting you 8,150 to 9,961 Mastery for 15 sec and stacking the deck. Stacking the deck increases the minimum Mastery on future hands by 302 until you leave combat, up to 3 times. (1 Min 30 Sec Cooldown)

Equip: Gain Ascendance every 8 seconds spent in combat.

Ascendance grants 89 of a random secondary stat for 15 sec, stacking up to 10 times.

This is a Nerubian embellishment.
